caption.center: ROY M. WOODS, EMPLOYEE, CLAIMANT v. ALCOA, SELF-INSURED EMPLOYER, RESPONDENT

court.center: Before the Arkansas Workers' Compensation Commission

opinion.panel: Upon review before the FULL COMMISSION in Little Rock, Pulaski County, Arkansas.
opinion.attorneys:
Claimant represented by the HONORABLE PHILIP E. KAPLAN and SILAS H. BREWER, JR., Attorneys at Law, Little Rock, Arkansas.
Respondents represented by the HONORABLE PHILLIP CARROLL, Attorney at Law, Little Rock, Arkansas.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] This matter comes before the Full Commission on the joint motion of the claimant and the respondents for reconsideration of the Full Commission's order dated February 3, 1997. In that order, we remanded this claim to the administrative law judge to settle the record.
[3] After giving due consideration to the joint motion of the parties, and all other matters properly before the Commission, we find that the motion for reconsideration must be, and hereby is, denied.
[4] IT IS SO ORDERED.
opinion.opinion_byline: ELDON F. COFFMAN, Chairman PAT WEST HUMPHREY, Commissioner MIKE WILSON, Commissioner
